meanings.definition: The act of relying too much on something or someone.
meanings.sent1: Her overreliances on her phone caused her to miss out on real-life experiences.
meanings.sent2: His overreliances on his assistant made him incapable of making decisions on his own.
meanings.sent3: The overreliances on his lucky socks for winning games became a running joke among his teammates.
meanings.sent4: The overreliances on technology in today's society can sometimes hinder human interaction.
meanings.sent5: The child's overreliances on his parents for every little task stunted his independence.

meanings.definition: Excessive dependence on a particular thing or person.
meanings.sent1: The company's overreliances on one supplier led to a shortage of essential materials.
meanings.sent2: Her overreliances on her best friend for emotional support became overwhelming for both of them.
meanings.sent3: The overreliances on his favorite coffee shop for his daily caffeine fix made him realize he needed to cut back.
meanings.sent4: The overreliances on social media for validation can have negative effects on self-esteem.
meanings.sent5: The team's overreliances on their star player made them vulnerable when he was injured.
